title: This Can’t Continue, It’s Dangerous (Ep 1734)
description:
These few words could change everything. In this episode, I address the disturbing comments overseas that could cause a genuine national security crisis for the United States. 

News Picks:

Biden must stop telling people what he’s NOT going to do. 

Biden’s lack of messaging discipline is creating a genuine national security crisis.


Obama-era CIA director strengthens Putin at home.


Biden’s comments on our use of nuclear weapons has opened some eyes.


A new lawsuit against big-tech could change the game.


GOP says they’ll look into Hunter malfeasance if they win back House.
